scripts.network: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run --filter ui start" "npm run launch:happ" "hc playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests --
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm run --filter ui start" "npm run launch:tauri" "hc playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "kitsune2-bootstrap-srv --listen "127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT"" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/nondominium.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT""
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run --filter ui package && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
